statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{12 \, x^{3} + 6 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x + 10 , -6 \, x^{3} + x - 6 , 2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 2 , -2 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 5 \, x - 4 , 6 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} - 21 \, x + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
